sentence: align the left purple block with the right side of the middle green block
pick up the green block in the center and place it in the left rear corner of the workspace
move the rear yellow block to the front left side of the workspace and to the front left side of the foremost green block
stack the rightmost green block on top of the yellow block you just moved
align the foremost purple block with the right side of the rearmost green block
move the last remained green block in front of the rearmost green block
